text: Noob question: if I edit and overwrite my landing pages templates do all the old published LP get updated? or just the new ones?
Is it possible to use different template for specific blog post?

<@U01PJ8MGM8X> , I faced this problem too. Unfortunately, you cannot use different templates under a same blog category. You’ll either have to create a new blog type, or make changes manually when you edit the blog post draft.
okay. I don’t want to create new blog type so I’ll probably just modify the existing template. Thank you <@U01C5SCRUT1> :+1:
